segments.text: I see a lot of water on the floor, and it's spreading quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the drain must be clogged for the sink to overflow like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets and floor are going to be damaged if this isn't stopped soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children are so focused on the cookies that they don't see the water either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the jar, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is looking up at him, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll slip on the wet floor when they come down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is letting in a lot of light, showing every detail of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to turn off the faucet and clean up the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
